# 1. Loading the dataset  
```{r}
anz_df <- read_csv(here("raw_data", "anthropometry_national_zaf.csv"))
```
## Dislay the first 5 rows
```{r}
kable(
  head(anz_df[-1, c("ISO3", "DataId", "Indicator", "Value", "CountryName", "SurveyYear")], 5),
  caption = "First 5 rows of the dataset"
)

```
# 2. Data Overview

## Summary statistics
```{r}
# 1. Remove first row if it's metadata/header
anz_dfc <- anz_df[-1, ]  

# 2. Convert relevant numeric columns to numeric
numeric_cols <- c("Value", "DenominatorWeighted", "DenominatorUnweighted", "CILow", "CIHigh")

anz_dfc <- anz_dfc %>%
  mutate(across(all_of(numeric_cols), ~ as.numeric(.)))

# 3. Create a tidy summary table
summary_table <- anz_dfc %>%
  summarise(across(all_of(numeric_cols),
                   list(mean = ~mean(., na.rm = TRUE),
                        sd   = ~sd(., na.rm = TRUE),
                        min  = ~min(., na.rm = TRUE),
                        max  = ~max(., na.rm = TRUE)))) %>%
  pivot_longer(
    cols = everything(),
    names_to = c("Variable", "Statistic"),
    names_sep = "_",
    values_to = "Value"
  ) %>%
  arrange(Variable)

# Save summary table
write_csv(summary_table, "../outputs/summary tables/summary_artho.csv")

# Display
kable(summary_table, caption = "Summary Statistics for Key Numeric Variables in the Dataset")
```

# 3. Data Quality 
## Find duplicated values 
```{r}
sum(duplicated(anz_df))
```
## Inspect columns for missing/empty data as values and pecentages respectively
```{r}
colSums(is.na(anz_df))
round(colMeans(is.na(anz_df)) * 100, 2)
```

## Check for unique values
```{r}
sapply(anz_df, function(x) length(unique(x)))

```
# 4. Visualizations
```{r}
# Convert Value to numeric safely (suppress NAs where conversion fails)
anz_df <- anz_df %>%
  mutate(Value = as.numeric(Value))

# Histogram of Values
ggplot(anz_df, aes(x = Value)) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 30, fill = "skyblue", color = "black") +
  labs(
    title = "Distribution of Indicator Values",
    x = "Value",
    y = "Frequency"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()

ggsave("../outputs/visuals/IndicatorValuesDistribution_histo.png", width = 6, height = 4)
```
